short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize your web experience - avoid broken sites and find related content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you don't want to get landed to a broken 404 page while opening a non-working link or wrong URL address, that can be avoided with the help of Browse Better Today. This extension improves your web experience letting you find alternatives to a non-working website right away.   Instead, it takes you to a list of related websites and useful sources so you can continue browsing.
